System classes of the "Edoc" module
The architecture of the "Edoc" module is shown in the diagram:
For the correct functioning of the System, the following system classes are used under the "Edoc" module.
Document template [RF_PATTERN]
Purpose
: the basic type storing template settings of documents. It significantly reduces the time for preparing and generating the necessary documents without losing their quality.
The generated document project is represented by a MS Word document, which can be edited and commented on, as well as Excel file or a *.pptx file
If necessary, the confirmation process of the modified document can be configured additionally.
The attribute composition
of the "Document template" type contains attributes of the
"Object"
parent type and the attributes shown in the following table:
Name
Field name
Value type
Purpose
Restrictions
ETL for saving data to an external source
PATTERN_SAVE
_DATA_ETL
The object referring to the "ETL Object" type [SYS_ETL_OBJ]
Storing the ETL reference
Filled in manually. Selecting the ETL object to save data to an external source (used during integration).
Recalculation Excel formula method
RF_RECALC_XLS
_FRML_TYPE
The object referring to the "Document templates. Recalculation Excel formula" [RF_RECALC_XLS
_FRML_TYPE]
Storing a reference to the recalculation of Excel formulas
Filled in manually.
Locking algorithm for creating comments
SYS_ALG_COMMENT_BLOCK
The object referring to the "Algorithm. Object profiles" [SYS_ALG_CARD] type
Storing the link to the header generation algorithm
Filled in manually. Determines whether it is possible to block the creation of comments in the eDoc module.
Comment visibility algorithm
SYS_RF_COMM
_FILTER_ALG
The object referring to the "Algorithm. Filter condition to select items" [SYS_ALG_CHOOSER] type
Storing the reference to the comment visibility algorithm
Filled in manually. Determines the ability to view comments in the eDoc module.
File name detection algorithm
FILENAME_ALG
The object referring to the "Algorithm. Object profiles" [SYS_ALG_CARD] type
Storing the reference to the header generation algorithm
Filled in manually. Determining the file name when uploading.
Algorithm for determining the name of the generated document
DOC_NAME_ALG
The object referring to the "Algorithm. Object profiles" type [SYS_ALG_CARD]
Storing the reference to the header generation algorithm
Filled in manually. Determining the name of the document in the eDoc module.
Algorithm for restricting permissions to comments
SYS_ALG_COMMENT
_PERMIS
The object referring to the "Algorithm. Object profiles" [SYS_ALG_CARD] type
Storing the reference to the header generation algorithm
Filled in manually. Determining the possibility of distinguishing the permissionss to create comments.
Algorithm to filter documents for comparison
SYS_ALG_DOCUMENT_FILTER
The object referring to the  "Algorithm. Filter condition to select items" type [SYS_ALG_CHOOSER]
Storing the reference to the comment visibility algorithm
Filled in manually. Determines whether documents can be filtered for comparison.
Algorithms of template items visibility
RF_PAT_ELEM
_SHOW_ALG
The child object of the "Algorithms of template items visibility " type  [RF_PAT_ELEM
_SHOW_ALG]
Storing a list of element visibility algorithms
Filled in manually. Determines the visibility of the document template fields using algorithms.
Algorithms to hide items of credit and security documentation
SYS_ALG_RF
_VISIBLE_LIST
The child object of the "Algorithm. Document templates. Visibility conditions" type [SYS_ALG_RF
_VISIBLE]
Storing a list of element visibility algorithms
Filled in manually. Determines the visibility of the generated document fields  in the eDoc module.
Basic object type
BASE_TYPE_ID
The object referring to the "Object type" type [SYS_OBJ_TYPE]
Storing a reference to the basic type of the pdocument template
Filled in manually. Determines the basic object type, attributes of which will be used in the generated document.
Upload to file without preview
NO_PREVIEW_IN_EDOC
Logical
Storing the file upload feature without preview
Filled in manually. Determines whether the document template can be uploaded, excluding viewing the file in the eDoc tool.
Attachment
SYS_FILE_ID
The object referring to the "File" type [FS_FILE]
Storing the template reference
Filled in manually. Determines a template for document generation.
Bookmarks
RF_BOOKMARK_LIST
The child object of the "Document template tab" type [RF_BOOKMARK]
Storing a list of bookmarks
Filled in manually. Determines a list of fields for entering bookmarks.
Identifier
IDENTIFIER
String
Storing the identifier of the document template
Filled in manually.
Images
SYS_RF_IMAGE_LIST
The object referring to the "File" type [FS_FILE]
Image reference storage
Filled in manually.
Data sources
RF_PATTERN
_SOURCE_LIST
The child object of the "Document template. Data source" type [RF_PATTERN
_SOURCE]
Storing a list of data sources
Filled in manually. Determines the settings for filling bookmarks.
Convert to a diffirent format
ID_839518
Boolean
Storing the conversion attribute to another format during document generation
Filled in manually. Activates the "Format" field.
Comment markers
SYS_COMMENT_MARKER_LIST
The object referring to the "Comment marker" type [SYS_RF_COMMENT_MARKER]
Storing comment markers
Filled in manually.
Edoc elements settings
RF_ELEMENTS
_SETTING
The child object of the "Configuring Edoc items" type [RF_ELEMENTS
_SETTING]
Storing a list of eDoc element settings
Filled in manually. Determines the document template user roles' elements visibility.
GML object
GML_OBJECT
Custom
The storage of the GML object
Filled in automatically.
GTAB object
GTAB_OBJECT
Custom
The GTAB object storage
Filled in automatically.
Description
NOTE
Line
Storing the description of the document template
Filled in manually.
Template questionnaire
RF_QUESTION_LIST
The child object of the "Template questionnaire item" type [RF_QUESTION]
Storing a list of fields of the template questionnaire
Filled in manually. Allows configuring fields, the values of which are adjusted during the generation of the document.
Optimize document generation
SYS_RF_GML_ONLY
Boolean
Storing a sign for optimizing document generation
Filled in manually.
Instances collection parameter
SYS_SEL_INST
_PARAM
The object referring to the "Object parameters" type [SYS_OBJ_PARAM]
Storing a parameter for an objects collection
Filled in manually.
Document template parameters
SYS_OBJ_PARAM
The child object of the "Object parameters" type [SYS_OBJ_PARAM]
Storing a list of parameters for a document template
Filled in manually. Determines the list of incoming parameters used to generate the document.
Document can be formed without a base object
RF_BASE_OBJ_NOT_NEEDED
Boolean
Storing the document generation attribute without the base object
Filled in manually.
Hyperlink support
HYPERLINK_SUPPORT
Boolean
Storing the hyperlink support feature
Filled in manually.
Order
ORD
Integer
Storing the document serial number
Filled in automatically with the ID of the current object.
Bound template algorithms
SYS_ALG_RF_LIST
The child object of the "Algorithm. Document templates" [SYS_ALG_RF]
Storing a list of algorithms
Filled in manually.
User roles that can edit/comment/submit the generated document for approval
RF_USER_GROUPS
The object referring to the "Access group" type [SYS_SEC_GROUP]
Storing the list of roles
Filled in manually. Determines a list of roles that can interact with the document.
Communication of paragraphs and responsible persons
RF_PAR_CONFORM_GROUP
The child object of the "Relation of the document paragraphs and approving groups" type [RF_PAR_CONFORM_GROUP]
Storing a list of links
Filled in manually. Establishes the relation between the paragraphs of the document template and the employees responsible for the coordination.
Automatically create sources
CREATE_INSTANCE
Boolean
Storing the source creation attribute
Filled in manually. Sources are automatically created.
List of subjects receiving file generation statistics
SYS_PF_ALLOWED
_SBJ_STAT
The object referring to the "Security subject" type [SYS_SEC_SUBJECT]
Storing the list of security subjects
Filled in manually. Determines the list of employees (including access groups) to whom the statistics file is available each time the file is generated.
Comment type
SYS_COMMENT_TYPE_ID
The object referring to the "Object type" type [SYS_OBJ_TYPE]
Storing the object type with comments
Filled in manually.
Object types
RF_PATTERN_OBJ
_TYPES
The child object of the "Relation of the document template to the object type" type
Storing a list of object types
Filled in manually. Displays object type to which the customized document template is attached.
Comment filters
SYS_COMMENT
_FILTERS
The child object of the "Comment Filter" type [SYS_RF_COMMENT
_FILTER]
Storing the filter list
Filled in manually. Determines whether comments can be filtered by objects and access groups.
Format
RF_CONVERT_TO
The object referring to the "Document template. Document format for export" type [RF_PATTERN
_OUTPUT_FMT]
Storing a link to the conversion format
Filled in manually. Determines the conversion of a document template to another format. Without selecting a setting, the document is uploaded in the format of a document template.
Generate bookmarks from document
RF_USE_DOC
_BOOKMARKS
Boolean
Storing a sign for automatically generating bookmarks based on created bookmarks in the uploaded document
Filled in manually.
Generate by file attached to object
USE_ATTACHED_FILE
Boolean
Storing a sign of using a file attached to an object
Filled in manually. It assumes the use of a file attached to the object from which the document is generated as a template. In this case, the System will select the object file whose classification matches the classification of the template.
The template is used to create credit and security documentation
RF_IS_PATTERN_KOD
Boolean
Storing the generation attribute in the CODE tool
Filled in manually. Determines the possibilities of working with the eDoc tool.
Template-based document [RF_DOCUMENT]
Purpose
: The basic type for creating and working with a document generated from a document template. The calculated values of the sources of the "Document template. Data source" type [RF_PATTERN_SOURCE] are displayed in the locations of bookmarks such as "Document template tab" [RF_BOOKMARK]. Sources and bookmarks are configured in the "Document template" object type [RF_PATTERN]. The eDoc editor is provided for working with the document, which allows managing the Documentâ€“System Object relationship, as well as fully working with the document text.
The attribute composition
of the "Template document" type contains attributes of the
"Object"
parent type and the attributes shown in the following table:
Name
Field name
Value type
Purpose
Restrictions
Document version
RF_DOCUMENT_VERSION
Integer
Storing the document version
Filled in automatically.
Temporary data to copy
RF_DOCUMENT_COPY
Custom
Temporary data storage
Filled in automatically.
Source values (custom)
RF_DOCUMENT_VAL
Custom
Storing source values
Filled in manually. Determines the settings for filling bookmarks.
Document identifier
RF_DOCUMENT_IDENT
String
Storing the document ID
Filled in manually.
Images
SYS_RF_IMAGE_LIST
The object referring to the "File" type [FS_FILE]
Image reference storage
Filled in manually.
Comments
SYS_COMMENTS
The child object of the "Comment in document" type [SYS_RF_COMMENTS]
Storing comments in a document
Filled in manually.
Object
OBJ_ID
The object referring to the "Object" type [SYS_OBJECT]
Object storage
Filled in automatically.
GML object
GML_OBJECT
Custom
The storage of the GML objects
Filled in automatically.
GTAB object
GTAB_OBJECT
Custom
The GTAB objects storage
Filled in automatically.
File
SYS_FILE_ID
The object referring to the "File" type [FS_FILE]
Document file storage
Filled in manually.
Document template
SYS_PATTERN_ID
The object referring to the "Document template" type [RF_PATTERN]
The document template storage
Filled in automatically.
Document template. Data source [RF_PATTERN_SOURCE]
Purpose
: the basic type for calculating the values of sources, based on which data added to the document. It has 19 possible extensions based on different types of System data.
Attribute composition
of the "Document template. Data source" type contains attributes of the
"Object"
parent type and the attributes shown in the following table:
Name
Field name
Value type
Purpose
Restrictions
Zoom algorithm
SCALE_ALG
The object referring to the "Algorithm. Object profiles" [SYS_ALG_CARD]
Storing a reference to the algorithm for determining the scale of the value
Filled in manually.
Algorithm to identify the object the modified data should be saved to
OBJ_TO_SAVE_ALG
The object referring to the "Algorithm. Object profiles" [SYS_ALG_CARD]
Storing a reference to the algorithm for determining the object to which the modified data needs to be saved
Filled in manually.
Algorithm to highlight source
RF_PS_HIGHLIGHT_ALG
The object referring to the "Algorithm. Document templates. Visibility conditions" type [SYS_ALG_RF_VISIBLE]
Storing a link to the source highlight detection algorithm
Filled in manually.
Filtering algorithm
SYS_ALG_CHOOSER_ID
The object referring to the "Algorithm.  Filter condition to select items" type [SYS_ALG_CHOOSER]
Storing a link to the filtering algorithm
Filled in manually.
The attribute where the changed value will be saved
ATTR_TO_SAVE
The object referring to the "Attribute type" type  [SYS_TYPE_ATTR]
Storing the changed value
Filled in manually.
Prohibits automatic continuation of lists for multiline values
RF_FORBID_LIST_CONTINUE
Boolean
Storing a continuation list attribute for multi-line values
Filled in manually.
Identifier
IDENTIFIER
String
Storing the document template ID
Filled in manually.
Multiline input
RF_PS_MULTILINE
Boolean
Storing a sign of entering multi-line values
Filled in manually.
Multiple choice
IS_MULTI
Boolean
Storing a multiple choice attribute
Filled in manually.
Document template
SYS_PATTERN_ID
The object referring to the "Document template" type [RF_PATTERN]
Storing the reference to the PDF file
Filled in manually.
HTML markup support
HTML_SUPPORT
Boolean
Storing a sign of HTML markup support
Filled in manually.
Hyperlink support
HYPERLINK_SUPPORT
Boolean
Storing the hyperlink support sign
Filled in manually.
Adjustments are applied to the source data
APPLY_CHANGES_TO_SOURCE
Boolean
Storing the attribute of applying edits to the source data
Filled in manually.
Allow instantiation in reference
ALLOW_CREATE_OBJ_INST
Boolean
Storing the indication of the possibility of creating an instance in the directory
Filled in manually.
Keep original text under bookmark
RF_PS_NOT_REPLACE_VALUE
Boolean
Storing an indication of the possibility of saving the source text under a bookmark
Filled in manually.
Source data type
RF_DATA_TYPE
The object referring to the "Data type of the document template data source" type [RF_PS_TYPE]
Storing the data type of the source
Filled in manually.
Storing the source data type
OBJ_TYPE_ID
The object referring to the "Object type" type [SYS_OBJ_TYPE]
Object type storage
Filled in manually.
Value format
RF_BOOKMARK_FMT
The object referring to the "Bookmark value format" type [RF_BOOKMARK_FMT]
Storing the value format
Filled in manually.
Document template tab [RF_BOOKMARK]
Purpose
: The basic type for outputting calculated source values to a document. Using bookmarks involves placing them in the right places of the document template for output to the document.
The attribute composition
of the "Bookmark of the document template" type contains attributes of the
"Object"
parent type and the attributes shown in the following table:
Name
Field name
Value type
Purpose
Restrictions
JAVA class of bookmark processing
SYS_JAVA_BK_PROCESSOR
String
The java class bookmark storage
Filled in manually.
SQL query
SQL_QUERY
The object referring to the "SQL query" type [SYS_SQL_QUERY]
Storing the reference to the SQL query
Filled in manually.
Algorithm
SYS_ALGORITHM
The object referring to the "Algorithm" type [SYS_ALGORITHM]
Storing the reference to the algorithm
Filled in manually.
Calculation date algorithm
ALG_CALC_REPORT_DATE
The object referring to the "Algorithm. Object profiles" type [SYS_ALG_CARD]
Storing a reference to the algorithm for determining the calculation date
Filled in manually.
Calculation object algorithm
ALG_CALC_DATA
The object referring to the "Algorithm. Object profiles" type  [SYS_ALG_CARD]
Storing a reference to the algorithm for determining the calculation object
Filled in manually.
Attribute
RF_DS_ATTR
Integer
Storing the attribute value
Filled in manually.
Attribute type
OBJ_TYPE_ATTR_ID
The object referring to the "Attribute type" type  [SYS_TYPE_ATTR]
Storing the attribute value
Filled in manually.
Analytics output
RF_BM_ANALYT_TYPE
The object referring to the "Document template bookmark. Output analytical breakdown" type [RF_BM_ANALYT_TYPE]
Storing the link to the analytical output
Filled in manually.
Display bookmark only when the condition is met
SYS_ALG_DISPLAY_COND
The object referring to the "Algorithm" type [SYS_ALGORITHM]
Storing the condition fulfillment attribute
Filled in manually.
Calculated indicator
IND_ID
The object referring to the type "Calculation Module. Calculated indicator" type [RISK_CALC_INDEX]
Storing calculated indicators
Filled in manually.
Identifier
IDENTIFIER
String
Storing the document template bookmark ID
template is filled in manually.
Data source
RF_SOURCE
The object referring to the "Data Source" type [RF_SOURCE]
Storing the reference to the data source
Filled in manually.
Data source to compare values
SYS_SOURCE_COMPARE
The object referring to the "Document template. Data source" type [RF_PATTERN_SOURCE]

Column count
RF_BM_COLS_COUNT
Integer
Storing the number of columns
Filled in manually. It takes a value from 1 to 1000.
Description
NOTE
String
Storing the description

RF_PATTERN_SOURCE

Logical

SYS_OBJ_PAR
The object referring to the "Object parameters" type [SYS_OBJ_PARAM]
Storing the parameters of the document template
Filled in manually.
Document template
SYS_PATTERN_ID
The object referring to the "Document template" type [RF_PATTERN]
Storing the reference to the PDF file
Filled in manually.
Allow to download from a file
ALLOW_DATA_IMPORT]
Boolean
Storing a sign that it is possible to download from a file
Filled in manually.
Order
ORD
Integer
Storing the sequence number of the document bookmark template
Filled in automatically with the ID of the current object.

The object referring to the "Document template bookmark type" type [RF_BOOKMARK_TYPE]
Bookmark type storage

RF_BOOKMARK_FMT
